page.title: 17Eaglesfield Carnival.
page.content: {Eaglesfield Carnival}took place on the {29th June.}It started on the village green with the judging of the tiny tots in their costumes. These ranged from fairies to a devil. Then came the five to ten year olds. They ranged from cave men to chimney sweeps. Eleven to sixteen year olds came next. In this group there were only three who entered. I won my section as an American footballer. After the procession around the village which was led by the{Mechanics {Band}came the{sports.}There were a lot of different races including sack races, egg and spoon, and flat races. Children in the carnival and children that lived in the village got a free tea in a paper bag. At night there was a{disco}during which the{prizes}for the costumes were presented.
